note.value: This section is composite the oldest part being the counter which closely resembles the older of the two main counters including some heavy metal drawer handles, the counter fronts have been added to give uniformity with the rest of the shop and may date from the same period as the ornate front to the section, counter: structure: in two parts, smaller has bank for four small drawers with space (possibly for other drawers) beside them, larger has bank of four drawers with a shelf over one larger drawer beside it, counter front: structure: in two parts; larger has two glass doors with adjustable shelves behind, smaller has one glass door and adjustable shelves behind, side: structure: two frosted glass panels, framed with wood and over a wooden panel
